schema: %d roles _ id {ROL}ID; {TYP}INT; >0; rating {DESC}"Numeric 0-5 star rating of performance" {TYP}DEC; >0; <=5; actor {DESC}"Actor's full name"; {TYP}STR; movie {DESC}"Movie's full name" {TYP}STR;; %d actors _ id {ROL}ID; {TYP}INT; >0; name {DESC}"Actor's full name" {TYP}STR;; age {DESC}"Actor's age in years" {TYP}INT; >=0; <200;; %d movies _ id {ROL}ID; {TYP}INT; >0; description {DESC}"Brief description of movie plot" {TYP}STR; year {DESC}"Year of production AD" >1800; <2100; genre scifi,drama,comedy,documentary; title {DESC}"Full movie title"; {TYP}STR;;
